values.help: Flush 2 relays module responds to commands ALL ON / ALL OFF that may be sent by the main controller or by other controller belonging to the system.
values.label: Activate / deactivate functions ALL ON/ALL OFF

items.label: ALL ON active, ALL OFF active
ALL ON is not active ALL OFF is not active
ALL ON is not active ALL OFF active
ALL ON active ALL OFF is not active

values.help:
0 - Auto OFF disabled. 1 - 65535 => 0,01 second - 655,35 seconds. Auto OFF enabled with define time, step is 10mseconds.
				Default value 0
values.label: Automatic turning Off relay Q1 after set time

values.help:
0 - Auto OFF disabled. 1 - 65535 => 0,01 second - 655,35 seconds. Auto OFF enabled with define time, step is 10 mseconds.
				Default value 0
values.label: Automatic turning Off relay Q2 after set time
Saving the state of the 2 relays after a power failure

items.label: Flush 2 relays module saves its state before power failure (it returns to the last position saved before a power failure)
Flush 2 relays module does not save the state after a power failure, it returns to off position.

values.help:
Set value from 0 - 100 (0%- 100%).
				0 - Reporting Disabled. 1 - 100 = 1% - 100% Reporting enabled.
				Power report is send (push) only when actual power in Watts in real time change for more than set percentage comparing to previous actual power in Watts, step is 1%.
				Default value 1
values.label: Power reporting in Watts on power change for Q1

values.help:
Set value from 0 - 100 (0%- 100%).
			0 - Reporting Disabled. 1 - 100 = 1% - 100% Reporting enabled.
			Power report is send (push) only when actual power in Watts in real time change for more than set percentage comparing to previous actual power in Watts, step is 1%.
			Default value 1
values.label: Power reporting in Watts on power change for Q2

values.help:
Set value means time interval (0 1 65535) in seconds, when power report is send.
				0 - Reporting Disabled. 1 - 65535 = 1 second - 65535 seconds.
				Reporting enabled. Power report is send with time interval set by entered value.
				Default value 300 (power report in Watts is send each 300s)
values.label: Power reporting in Watts by time interval for Q1

values.help:
Set value means time interval (0 1 65535) in seconds, when power report is send.
				0 - Reporting Disabled. 1 - 65535 = 1 second - 65535 seconds.
				Reporting enabled. Power report is send with time interval set by entered value.
				Default value 300 (power report in Watts is send each 300s)
values.label: Power reporting in Watts by time interval for Q2
